title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Linear Algebra, Functional AnalysisScalable structure of information, the new mathematical engineering, good approximations, wavelets a positional notation for functions, algebra and geometry of wavelets matrices, one-dimensional wavelet systems, examples of one-dimensional wavelet systems, higher dimensional wavelet systems, wavelets on Z, Z_n, l^2(Z), Fourier series, transform and convolution on l*2, Mallat algorithm, wavelet approximation, wavelet calculus and connection coefficients, multiscale representation of geometry, Wavelet-Galerkin Solutions of partial differential equations, wavelet applications - wavelet data compression, modulation and channel coding.
